entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Flurries beginning before morning. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
